ios.buildCommand: /usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'Set :CFBundleVersion 105' ios/App/App/Info.plist && /usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'Set :CFBundleShortVersionString 3.0.0' ios/App/App/Info.plist && xcodebuild -workspace ios/App/App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release -archivePath build/App.xcarchive archive

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: PitBox needs photo library access to save and share your racing photos and setup sheets.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: PitBox saves photos to your library so you can keep your racing memories.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: PitBox needs camera access to capture dyno sheets, track conditions, and share race day moments with the racing community.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: PitBox uses the microphone to record voice notes about your setup and race conditions.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: PitBox uses your location to find nearby tracks and automatically tag your setups with track information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: PitBox uses your location to find nearby tracks and auto-tag your setups with track data.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: PitBox uses your location to automatically detect when you arrive at a track and help you find racing events near you.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: PitBox uses motion data to analyze your driving performance and track session metrics.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: PitBox uses Bluetooth to connect to racing sensors and track data equipment.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: PitBox uses Bluetooth to connect to racing sensors and track data equipment.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: PitBox needs access to your calendar to add race events, track days, and maintenance reminders.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: PitBox needs access to reminders to help you stay on top of vehicle maintenance and race prep.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: PitBox needs access to your contacts to help you find and connect with other racers you know.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: PitBox uses speech recognition to let you add voice notes and dictate setup information hands-free.
infoPlist.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: PitBox uses the local network to sync data with other devices and racing equipment.
infoPlist.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: PitBox needs access to your media library to let you add music to your racing videos.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: PitBox uses Face ID to securely protect your racing data and account information.
infoPlist.NSSiriUsageDescription: PitBox uses Siri to let you access your racing data and setups with voice commands.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: PitBox uses health data to track your physical performance during racing sessions.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: PitBox saves your racing activity data to Apple Health for comprehensive fitness tracking.
infoPlist.NSHomeKitUsageDescription: PitBox can integrate with your smart garage and workshop equipment.
infoPlist.NFCReaderUsageDescription: PitBox uses NFC to read data from racing equipment tags and sensors.
